{{Wireless embedded system |brand=AboCom |model=AP900 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=10/16/2003 |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=OEM |type=access point,bridge |fcc_id=MQ4-AP900 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ubicom |cpu1_model=IP2022 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Z-Com XG-601 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3880 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=ISL3686A |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand=Davicom |eth_chip1_model=DM9000E |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.240 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} "M01-AP900-X10" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :"XG-601-V01", "2003.04.22", and "70-480301-01" is silkscreened on the wireless module.
This device may be sold by '''Hawking''' as the HWBA54G.
Default settings are per the FCC manual. :The OUI for the wireless module may be 00:60:B3 ('''Z-Com''').
